name: Crossbow Potato
description:
The game was originally created from a school project, but is not finished yet.

Development

It's made in GameMaker 8.1. All sounds, music and art is made by me, but heavily inpired from @jwaaap , @uheartbeast and Titan Souls of course <3

Setting

You play as a potato with a crossbow to overcome the curse of potato-aim.

Controls

You can ONLY play with a controller right now

- Left stick: Move player

- Right stick: Aim

- Left bumper: Dodge roll

- Right bumper: Shoot

Hope you enjoy :)
